title: Board of Governors Information
snippet: Learn about the EBRD's journey to investing more than €210 billion in over 7,500 projects · Through projects, business services and involvement in high-level policy reform, we're doing more than ever before

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: Profile of Sir Suma Chakrabarti who was EBRD President between 2012-2020 · View details of the candidates and process from the 2024 election. View details of the candidates and process from the 2020 election.

title: EBRD Shareholders and Board of Governors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.
